main.name: Dayrent Tjiang
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Dayrent! I am currently studying at Monash University majoring in Software Development. I am an IT Student with interest and expertise in full-stack web development and project management, specializing in user-focused web applications. Skilled in MERN stack, with a strong background in delivering solutions that enhance traffic and user experience. Proven success in managing web app development and implementing marketing strategies, including a 30% increase in online traffic for my first client.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.degree: Bachelor of  Information Technology, Software Development

work.description: Building Real World Projects that is solving a real world problems and help businesses to grow exponentially.

projects.title: Internal System
projects.category: building web app to manage internal company system

testimonials.text: Software engineering is not just about writing code. It's about solving problems and making lives better.
The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
